mapper.update: INSERT INTO j_permission (method, router, name, description, create_at, update_at) VALUES (#{p.method}, #{p.router}, #{p.name}, #{p.description}, #{p.createAt}, #{p.updateAt}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = VALUES(name), description = VALUES(description), create_at = VALUES(create_at), update_at = VALUES(update_at);
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM j_permission RIGHT JOIN j_ptype_permission jpp ON j_permission.pid = jpp.pid WHERE jpp.tid=#{tid};
